mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT_ROOM CR INNER JOIN CHAT_ROOM_MEMBER CRM USING (ROOM_ID) INNER JOIN CHAT_MESSAGE CM USING (ROOM_ID) WHERE USERNAME=#{username} ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_ID=#{roomId} ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID ASC
SELECT U.USERNAME, C.ROOM_ID, U.SNS, U.FILE_NAME FROM USER U INNER JOIN CHAT_ROOM_MEMBER C USING (USERNAME) WHERE ROOM_ID=#{roomId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT_ROOM_MEMBER WHERE USERNAME=#{username} AND ROOM_ID=#{roomId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID FROM CHAT_MESSAGE INNER JOIN CHAT_ROOM USING (ROOM_ID) WHERE SENDER_ID IN (#{user1}, #{user2}) AND ROOM_TYPE='1:1 채팅' GROUP BY ROOM_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT SENDER_ID)=2
SELECT ROOM_ID FROM CHAT_ROOM_MEMBER INNER JOIN CHAT_ROOM USING (ROOM_ID) WHERE USERNAME IN (#{user1}, #{user2}) AND ROOM_TYPE='1:1 채팅' GROUP BY ROOM_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT USERNAME)=2

SELECT CONTENTS, CREATED_AT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CREATED_AT= ( SELECT MAX(CREATED_AT) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_ID=#{roomId} ) AND MESSAGE_ID= ( SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_ID) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_ID=#{roomID} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM (ROOM_NAME, ROOM_TYPE, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{roomName}, '1:1 채팅', NOW())
INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM (ROOM_NAME, ROOM_TYPE, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY) VALUES (#{roomName}, '그룹 채팅', NOW(), #{createdBy})
INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE (ROOM_ID, SENDER_ID, CONTENTS, MESSAGE_TYPE, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{contents}, #{messageType}, #{createdAt})
